idea: Following half a decade of research, sampling, trials (and a fair few mosquito bites) we're ecstatic to introduce Marshmello Gear: Anti-Bug Apparel – uber cool hoodies and blankets that’ll protect you from mosquitoes, ticks and other deadly insects. Tested at the most highly accredited clinical labs around the world, we have worked really hard to create a product that doesn’t have the usual hazards – ours is odourless, long-lasting and DEET free. Visit marshmellogear.com
name: Carillion Healthcare Pvt Ltd

idea:
FitZup is a Lifestyle Nutrition Brand & we aim at building a Lifestyle Fitness Community of potential and prospective Fitness enthusiasts. We work on 3Cs model Content Community Commerce.

FitZup Product Line -

a. National Product Line

Forest Nutrition: With Ayurveda as a base we have numerous Lifestyle Nutrition products which range from variants of Teas and Honeys to Plant based bars and Protein balls

Sports Nutrition: Our Sports Nutrition Series consists of Pre workouts & Intra Workout Powders, Isolates and Concentrate Whey Protein & Whey Bars and Balls 

Health Essentials: MultiVitamins, Probiotics, Cow Colostrum, Vitamin D Shots etc.

Performance Series: Ayurvedic Blend of Effective Herbs stacked in capsules offering products like Testo-One, Slender Body, Skin & Hair, Immunity Support, etc. 

b. International Product line: 

FitZup Australia

FitZup Australia is equally owned partnership, situated in Narre Warren; Melbourne by
Avocado Lifestyle Private Limited (FitZup) &,
Kartik Gupta (Our Australian Partner)
FitZup Australia entered the market with "Naturally Good Expo" held at Sydney ICC (April 2018) and will be launching 8 SKUs specially designed and curated for Australian market by August 2018

Please see attached our Company Credentials & Catalogs of the Products Launched 

FitZup Cafe 

Our newest endeavor includes startup of FitZup™ Cafe - A one of a kind Revolutionary Fitness Cafe, merging our offline store & a cafe house where recipes are to be made out of FitZup Products.
We have associated with MultFit Gym Chain for FitZup Cafe in their 26 Outlets (PAN INDIA) & in talks with premium Societies, Malls, Cinemas, LRF's and Corporate Parks. 


FitZup Travel & Tourism

We started with offering International Fitness Retreats to Influential Celebrities and Bloggers.
Links for the same below

Countries Covered - JordanXtreme Jordan TaiwanRetreat Taiwan MaldivesMaldives

FitZup Intellectual Properties

Our very first IP was Holifit (Holifit IP HolitFit), A one of a kind and first Fitness Holi Party which along with Holi Festivities boasted many fitness activities topped with our healthy products and foods. This event was attended by many celebrities and got coverage from major news networks as well.
name: FitZup

idea: Pioneering safety solutions, comprehensive data logging and analytics and innovative technologies that are intuitive and flexible are their key strengths. The company's first product  6th Sense has been installed in some of the biggest fleets in the country. 6th Sense is a product that warns drivers with alarms in a potentially dangerous situation and also automatically brakes in case no action is taken by the driver. What makes this product truly unique is the price point it comes at which makes it feasible to be fitted even in larger fleets without adversely affecting cost. 6th Sense can be retrofitted into any vehicle making it versatile and bringing down costs for the customer who can offer volumes.
name: Sixth Sensor Technology Pvt. Ltd.
